field.description: The last trigger type

field.description: Lower four bits of last trigger number

field.name: LastTriggerCode
field.description: The last trigger code

field.name: InvalidCount
field.description: Number of invalid triggers. I.e. LVL1 triggers not preceeded by a reference time signal

field.name: MultipleCount
field.description: Count of multiple reference time signals before a LVL1 trigger, i.e. additional edges on the input which were not sent by the CTS

field.name: SpikeCount
field.description: Number of short signals on the reference time input. E.g. signals detected by the synchronous logic, but shorter than the 100 ns reference time signal

field.name: SpuriousCount
field.description: Number of occurences of reference time signals before a calibration trigger which should not sent a reference time

field.name: EdgeCount
field.description: Number of edges on the reference time input. Sampled using asynchronous circuitry. Not available in all designs
